text.div:
serviceRequestRequesterSearchParameter

Parameter requester:reference

Searches for serviceRequest by Practitioner uuid who requested the service eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/ServiceRequest?requester:Practitioner={uuid}

ResourceServiceRequest
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesServiceRequest
MultiplesThe parameter cannot repeat or have multiple values

name: serviceRequestRequesterSearchParameter
description: Searches for serviceRequest by Practitioner uuid who requested the service eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/ServiceRequest?requester:Practitioner={uuid}
